item.description:
A famous language school Berlitz offering us to have our Study/Conversation night at their facility for free.

Just like other study night, bring your own study material, or brush up your conversation skills!

This is a second time trial event, as we are planning more event at there in future. We are planning conversation group with Berlitz students too.

We plan to go to Fire & Ice near by from Berlitz after this event. Student can get discount dinner for $9.95. Bring your Student ID if you have one.

Please feel free to send me email if you have any questions.

Â
item.how_to_find_us: Please check-in at the entrance, and tell them you came for Japanese/English Language exchange meetup.
item.name: Study/Conversation night at Berlitz
